attributes.additional_details: Sweat shops is a term of workplace which does not have acceptable work conditions, labour time and also the amount of money earned by each of the workers.We want this issue to be addressed with great importance as it is a huge problem not only in the UK but internationally as well. There are far too many people in the world which are part of this problem which hasn't got much awareness considering it is very important towards the need of money for each of these workers.
